Description: Round-topped limestone stela; rosette-medallion at the top; six rows of Coptic text below.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.145)
Zuntz 1931 / Koptische Grabstelen. Ihre zeitliche und örtliche Einordnung (22)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: I.Brit.Mus.Copt. I App:18 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
